title: Firefox
content: I would like to be able to restrict autofill of my name, address, phone number, ect to only (1 or 2) certain websites. I don't want it to be available for all other websites. Can this be done?
creator: tcnews

title: HTTPS issue when loading URL from Spotlight or Alfred on macOS
content:
I discovered when using either Spotlight or Alfred to open a URL with Firefox, for a brief moment I get the lock icon with a red strike through it and its a bit concerning. I was able to quickly take a screenshot and it seems that Firefox is showing this for its own page.

Is this normal or safe?
creator: john.peden
